title: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner
description: A couple's attitudes are challenged when their daughter introduces them to her African-American fianc√©.

title: Malcolm X
description: Biographical epic of the controversial and influential Black Nationalist leader, from his early life and career as a small-time gangster, to his ministry as a member of the Nation of Islam.

title: Talk to Me
description: The story of Washington D.C. radio personality Ralph Petey Greene, an ex-con who became a popular talk show host and community activist in the 1960s.
